core_features.description: Manage customer companies, contacts, addresses, tagging, e-Faktur credentials, and track customer targets and rewards.
Handle quotations and sales orders with discounting, margin calculations, revisions, expiry tracking, approvals, deliveries, invoicing, and multi-currency support.
Set and enforce credit limits, overlimit approvals, creditor status formulas, and payment term approvals to control financial risk.
Maintain product databases, bundles, variants, attributes, SKUs, barcodes, and manage customer-specific or company-wide pricelists.
Provide detailed reports (pivots, margins, top products/customers, profitability), customer segmentation (RFM), and predictive sales forecasts using statistical and AI models.
Manage long-term sales agreements or blanket orders with multiple deliveries and printouts.
Organize multi-level sales teams, assign leaders/members, manage access rights, set activity targets, and track achievement.
Track and manage sales leads, opportunities, pipeline stages, activity logs, reasons for won/lost deals, and online lead forms.
Support Android/iOS apps for customer management, quotation/orders, GPS tracking, KPI tracking, call logs, and offline hybrid use.
Manage customer incentives through sales coupons, discounts, free products/shipping, loyalty points, rewards, and promotion validity controls.
